name: Tirana
summary: Capital city since 1920; vibrant arts, cafés, and boulevards.
history_markdown: Founded in the 17th century; became Albania’s capital in 1920. Modern growth with colorful façades and public squares.

name: Prishtina
summary: Administrative, cultural, and university center of Kosovo.
history_markdown: Ottoman period roots; major growth in the 20th century; post-1999 transformation.
dialect_notes: Gheg is dominant; colloquial forms common in daily speech.
